title: The Hindu: English News Today, Current Latest News
description:
The Hindu English News app brings to you the credible and in-depth journalism of India’s National English Newspaper as a rich digital experience.
India’s most trusted English News app keeps you updated on politics, business, cricket, football, Bollywood, science, technology, environment, art, literature and more. You can also tap into expert comments and news analysis in our Editorials & Opinion section.
The redesigned “The Hindu” app delivers live updates, breaking news updates, latest news, current news and analysis, trending stories, events, live scores and more on an interface that is easy to use and navigate. The Hindu English News app brings your phone The Hindu’s in-depth reporting of world news, national news, state news and city news.
You will have breaking news, latest news, live updates, top stories, in-depth analysis, opinion, and today's news and top headlines at your fingertips.
Key features
◉ Personalize Home Screen for Local News
◉ Mark Articles as "Read Later"
◉ Engage with Stories by Commenting
◉ Offline mode to read News Offline
◉ Read aloud - App read the news to you
◉ Night Mode - Easy to read news in dim light
You can receive notifications on the latest in business news, sports news and entertainment news. You will also receive Hindi movie reviews, English movie reviews, Tamil movie reviews, Telugu movie reviews and more as text and video.
You can stay updated quickly on breaking news headlines on all latest topics and trending topics by just swiping left or right to read the next news article.
News Sections
Latest India English News:
Covers all top news stories happening at the national level including stories about Central Government, Narendra Modi, election results, BJP, Congress
State news:
We bring you latest news from Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh, Kerala, Telangana, Karnataka, Uttar Pradesh and all other states of India.
World News:
From India-Pakistan relations to Donald Trump, we cover all latest news around the globe. Also detailed news analysis on topics covering Syrian Civil War, Taliban Forces, Sri Lankan Government etc.
Local News:
The Hindu also brings you regional news covering of major cities--trending stories and latest news updates from New Delhi, Kolkata, Mumbai, Chennai, Bengaluru, and Hyderabad.
Sports News:
Follow your favourite sports and get all live scores, updates and news of cricket, football, tennis and other sports. Sports News from The Hindu covers deep and wide range of Sport Events like IPL, Wimbledon, World Cup, Football Series etc.
Cinema News:
Latest movie reviews, cinema news, Hollywood news, Bollywood news, Tollywood news, Kollywood news and all movie related updates.
Technology News:
We also bring to you all science and technology related updates of latest gadgets and gadget launches, upcoming gadgets, mobile phones and more.
Extra features
»Enhanced News Format - Redesigned user interface following latest design methodology for better readability
»Read Aloud Feature - The app will read the articles to the users
»Augmented Reality -PrintPlay an Augmented reality feature for interactive visual content
»Podcasts -Listen to podcasts using your Android phone
